sentences: Lööb punaseks - hari läheb lööb punaseks
context: The word 'lööb' in this context refers to the action of becoming extremely angry or furious, as suggested by the dictionary definition which shows expressions like 'hari läheb lööb punaseks' (hair goes red) and 'harja punaseks ajama' (to make hair go red). This is an Estonian idiom for intense anger.
